title: Bernie’s Communist Revolution Is Coming | Guest: Giancarlo Sopo | 2/24/20
description:
Obama-era DOJ whistleblower Philip Haney was found dead over the weekend, reportedly by suicide. But Glenn knew Haney as a true patriot, a winter soldier, and a friend. And he doesn’t believe the "suicide" theory at all. Bernie Sanders won big in Nevada, but looks quite communist after backing Fidel Castro’s literacy programs. A Salon article laid out democratic socialism’s goal to destroy capitalism and prepare for revolution. And new Trump-Russia interference rumors may have been leaked by Adam Schiff’s committee! Coronavirus has hit Iran, South Korea, and Italy as the world prepares for a possible pandemic. And TheBlaze.com writer Giancarlo Sopo discusses how poorly Cuban-Americans like himself view Sanders’ socialism.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
